name: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for generating a list of potential reservation times from which the user can select.

items.name: func resolveRestaurant(for: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent, completion: (INRestaurantResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the restaurant to use when gathering reservation times.

items.name: func resolvePartySize(for: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent, completion: (INIntegerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the party size to use when generating the reservation times.

items.name: func resolvePreferredBookingDateComponents(for: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent, completion: (INDateComponentsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the date to use when generating the reservation times.

items.name: func confirm(getAvailableRestaurantReservationBookings: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent, completion: (INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can provide a set of potential reservation times.

items.name: func handle(getAvailableRestaurantReservationBookings: INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent, completion: (INGetAvailableRestaurantReservationBookingsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles generating the list of potential reservation times.
